blocks.subject: Re: Western Wholesale Activities - Gas & Power Conf. Call
text: Time:    7:30 am Pacific, 9:30 am Central, and 10:30 am Eastern time
The table of the on-going FERC issues and proceedings is available to all
team members on the O drive. Please feel free to revise/add to/ update this
Update- request for rehearing of 6/19 Order
Claim for refunds made by PNW utilities
CAISO Order of Chief Judge Scheduling Settlement Conference,Docket
Motion for Refunds of CA Parties and Pacific Gas and Electric
